resources.string: New! You're in control - choose what info you want to share with apps.
Unexpected error while downloading an image.

Visit facebook.com/device
on your smartphone or computer
and enter this code
Which account do you want to sign in to this app with?
Please wait while we finish adding your account.
We are having problems connecting to the server
Sign out of all Microsoft apps using %1$s
Do you want to sign out of this app?
We can't sign you in because your account has been suspended from Xbox Live.
Sorry, we couldn't complete your Xbox profile. If it happens again, try setting it up at <u>Xbox.com</u>
Sorry, something went wrong. Give it another try, or try on <u>Xbox.com</u>
Make sure you're online, then try again. We can't connect right now.
Here's your name on Xbox (or "gamertag"). Change it if you want!
Your friends and their friends can see if you're online, your game clips, and your recent apps and games. You can change these on <u>Xbox.com</u>
Your Xbox friends and their friends can see your real name and your profile. Your Xbox friends can see if you're online, your game clips, and your recent apps and games
Your Xbox friends can see your profile, but not your real name. Friends and their friends can see if you're online and available to play, but you'll need a parent's permission to add friends
Sign in with a different Microsoft account
You can customize your profile in the Xbox app
Xbox Live Game Invite Body With Context String
Favorite friends go first on your friends list. You'll see when they go online or start broadcasting.
Friends show up on your friends list and activity feed. They see you as a new follower.
You share your real name with everyone on Xbox. Make changes in the Xbox app.
You share your real name with all your friends on Xbox. Make changes in the Xbox app.
Something went wrong. Please try again later.
Your feedback has been sent to Xbox.
Thanks for taking the time to help make Xbox a better place to play.
We couldn't send your report. Click Report to Xbox to try again.
You'll no longer get their messages or invites. You won't be matched up in games, and they can no longer see your online activity. If they were on your friends list, we removed them.
Sorry, we can't block this person right now. Click Block to try again.
Send messages, see game clips, and more
You can't access this feature because of how your account is set up. You can change this by modifying your privacy settings.
Are you sure you want to block this sender?
Sorry, we can't add this person right now. Try again in a while.
Sorry, we can't save your changes right now. Try again in a while.
Sorry, we could only save some of your changes. Try saving again.
Following this link may interrupt a game in progress
You won’t get any new phone friend suggestions.
You won’t appear in any more phone friend suggestions.
Phone friends you’ve already added will still be friends.
Find friends using your phone contacts?
When your phone contacts link to Xbox, we'll add them to your friend suggestions
Your phone contacts will see both your gamertag and real name in their suggestions. (And anyone with your phone number will be able to recognize you on Xbox.)
Contacts are checked periodically to find new matches.
Your real name is shared with any phone contact you add as a friend.
Contacts are checked periodically to find new matches.
A couple notes: • Your name sharing setting will change to Friends I choose. • When you share your real name, friends of friends see it too. You can always make changes to name sharing in Settings.
Enter your phone number to connect with friends on Xbox.
We will send a text message to verify your phone number.
Add them now or find them later in your suggestions
There are several ways to find people you know.
Enter the verification code we sent to your phone.
If you don't receive your code, select Resend or Call me to get another. Carrier charges may apply
Gaming is more fun with friends
Sorry, we can’t set up phone friend finder right now. Try again in a while.
This feature works best with more people. Tell your phone contacts your are on Xbox -Each person you select will be sent the following message Copy of text message -SMS/Text/Data rates may apply
Sorry, something went wrong. Select Find friends to try again.
We are unable to unlink your phone contacts at the moment. Try again in a while.
Something went wrong there. Select Unlink to try again.
Make sure to enter the correct region and phone number
Gaming is better with friends - join me on Xbox! Download the app at http://x.box/redirect
Send a message to your friends
Sorry, we weren't able to add friends. Try again in a while.
You won't get any new Facebook friend suggestions.
You won't appear in any more Facebook friends suggestions.
Facebook friends you've already added will still be friends.
Ready to connect with your Facebook friends?
Your name sharing setting will change to Friends.
Your Xbox friends and their friends will see your Xbox real name. You can always make changes to name sharing in Settings.
Your name sharing setting will change to Friends I choose. When you add Facebook friends they'll see your Xbox real name.
When you share your real name, friends of friends see it too. You can always make changes to name sharing in Settings.
When you add Facebook friends they'll see your Xbox real name.
We'll add friends to your suggestions as they link their Facebook accounts to Xbox. Facebook friends will see your gamertag and Facebook name in their suggestions.
Sorry, we can't start the Facebook friend finder right now. Try again in a while.
Sorry, something went wrong. Select Find friends to try again.
Sorry, we can't unlink your Facebook account right now. Try again in a while.
Sorry, something went wrong there. Select Unlink to try again.
It looks like you're the first to link your account.
Add them from your friend suggestions.
Find more people, have more fun. Tell your Facebook friends you're on Xbox!
Add me with the Facebook friend finder.
There's a problem with the link to your Facebook account. Select Repair to fix it.
Don't ask me to link Facebook
Sorry, we can't repair this link right now. Try again in a while.
Search for gamertags you already know
Add them now or find them later in your suggestions.
Add them now or find them later in the Xbox App
Invite the rest of your Facebook friends to Xbox
Share an invitation to join Xbox
You're about to leave Minecraft and go to the Xbox app. This may disconnect you from a multiplayer game.
Couldn't find this person. Did you enter their entire gamertag?
Let %1$s see my real name. It may help them recognise who you are.
%1$s may not recognise you as %2$s. They are sharing their name with you. Check the box to share with them.
%1$s would like to use your Contacts but does not have permission. To continue, go to Settings > %2$s and give the app access to Contacts.
Allow Ad to store image in Picture gallery?
Allow Ad to create a calendar event?
%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone.
%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet.
%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services.
%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services.
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating.
A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account.
%1$s relies on Google Play services, which is not supported by your device. Contact the manufacturer for assistance.
%1$s requires one or more Google Play services that are not currently available. Please contact the developer for assistance.
Error signing in the specified account. Please choose a different account.
Accessing accounts from a restricted profile is not supported.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. If the problem persists, please contact the developer for assistance.
If you are not using an Xperia Play, check this
Change the reported screen density to change size of controls - leave blank to disable
Use the built-in version of the Slickcraft texture pack by NathanX
Extract original textures with root access
Backup original APK with root access and set it as the texture pack
Successfully set original APK as texture pack.
Unable to gain superuser access - are you rooted?
It seems you are using textures from an older version of Minecraft PE. Please run "Extract original textures with root access" in the options screen again to update textures.
Select .png file to change skin to (will only be visible to you)
Redirect Realms to third-party server list
Control the player by rotating your device. Requires ModPE Scripts to be turned on.
Show "Insert text" option in in-game patch manager
Disable ModPE scripts' access to Android functions,\nlike deleting files and using internet
A fix to keyboard bugs in the new 0.8.x update
Download skins based on PC username
Pretty much everything on this page is useless. They are here for troubleshooting bugs.
Upgrade to BlockLauncher Pro to patch more than 3 patches

BlockLauncher has detected a recent crash. Safe Mode has been enabled to prevent further crashes by misbehaving patches. In this mode, all patches are disabled. Do you want to continue in Safe Mode without patches or return to normal patching mode?
Do you want to import this patch?
These patches cannot be patched because they are not in a format that BlockLauncher recognizes:
Do you want to set this skin?
Do you want to set this texturepack?
Do you want to import this ModPE Script?
Copyright © 2013–2017 Zhuowei Zhang. Do not distribute without permission.

This program uses the aFileChooser library by Paul Burke. 
 This program contains code from Snowbound's PTPatchTool, licensed under the Eclipse Public License. 
 This program contains a modified version of NathanX's Slickcraft texture pack: used with permission.
 Parts of the built-in texture pack is based on RepetiCraft by Theevilpplz and used with permission.
 This program contains a version of the Cydia Substrate framework by Saurik, licensed under the GNU Lesser General Public License.
 This program uses the libsuperuser library by Chainfire.
 This program contains a copy of the Rhino JavaScript engine from the Mozilla project.
 For full licensing information, check the Minecraft Forums thread.
This application was made possible by the work of many talented translators, testers, and programmers. Thank you.\nView the Minecraft Forums thread for a list of contributors.
Open Minecraft Forums thread for BlockLauncher
BlockLauncher cannot find a copy of Minecraft PE on your device. This app is designed to patch the full version of Minecraft Pocket Edition by Mojang.
Thank you for trying BlockLauncher. BlockLauncher starts your copy of Minecraft Pocket Edition and adds additional features to it through patches, addons, skins, and textures.
Your device runs Android Jelly Bean or newer, so BlockLauncher cannot access the default textures. The demo texture pack has been enabled so you can test the launcher.
To get started with BlockLauncher, tap the wrench icon at the top of the screen. For more help, visit the Minecraft Forum thread.
This version of Minecraft PE is not supported by BlockLauncher. BlockLauncher will run in safe mode temporarily. Please check for updates to BlockLauncher as support may be added in a newer version.
This feature is not supported in BlockLauncher yet.
Enter the ID of the script to import
Enter the address of the script to import
Upgrade to BlockLauncher Pro to patch more than one script at a time
An error occurred in a ModPE Script
Your ModPE Scripts have been disabled in multiplayer. They will be re-enabled when you disconnect from the server.
ModPE scripts are not supported on your version of Minecraft PE. Some methods in scripts may not function, or may crash the launcher. Use at your own risk.
Do you want to import this script? It will get access to the same resources as your BlockLauncher instance, including potentially your passwords and other sensitive information.
has been disabled because it encountered too many errors. Sorry!
ModPE Script support is required to take screenshots. \nYou can enable ModPE Script support in the Launcher Options page.

Unfortunately, BlockLauncher cannot run on your device as security software on your phone, such as Samsung Knox or SELinux, is preventing live patching. 

 We are working on a fix for this, but in the meantime, BlockLauncher functions are limited to patching .mods and loading texture packs. 

ModPE scripts cannot be loaded, and all .mod patches require a restart.
Allows the application to be loaded as an addon into BlockLauncher. This means that this app can access network, storage, and do anything Minecraft PE has the permission to do.
Use old live patching code from BlockLauncher 1.6.8
Turn this on if BlockLauncher stopped working after the 1.6.9 update.
Enable command history on chat screen
Hide the navigation buttons during gameplay
There are no recordings to view.

Certain video and audio capture functionality is Powered by Kamcord™ (kamcord.com), and your use of such functionality is subject to the Kamcord Terms of Use (kamcord.com/tos) and Privacy Policy (kamcord.com/privacy)
Audio engine : FMOD Studio by Firelight Technologies
You need to install the Substrate app to use BlockLauncher. (You do not have to set it up, and you do not need root access: you only need to install it.)
Write crash logs to shared storage

This version of Minecraft PE is not supported by this version of BlockLauncher.\nYou have Minecraft PE MINECRAFT_VERSION, but BlockLauncher only supports Minecraft PE SUPPORTED_VERSION. Please update your copy of Minecraft PE.
You need to purchase the BlockLauncher Extras package to use this feature.

Unfortunately the version of Minecraft PE on this device is not compatibile with BlockLauncher. Please install Minecraft PE for ARCH processors.\n(You probably didn't purchase Minecraft: if that is the case, buy a legitimate version of Minecraft, which will be compatible with ARCH processors)
The addons ADDONS cannot be loaded as they do not support ARCH processors.

For this feature to work, you need to re-import each of your scripts manually once so that BlockLauncher can remember their original locations.\nRe-importing scripts automatically may pose a security risk. Disable this feature if you do not need it.
Change inventory and crafting windows to Desktop mode
Unfortunately, the Store functionality is not supported in BlockLauncher.
